original_title: If You Say It Forty Times...
overview: Commissioned for the group exhibition Post-Peace curated by Katia Krupennikova, features the artist reading testimony from Turkish officials and public figures in which they claim they have “forgotten” key details regarding incidents of government-enacted violence. The exhibition was censored in Istanbul by Akbank Sanat in 2016, and opened in Württembergischer Kunstverein in Stuttgart on 25th February 2017.
title: If You Say It Forty Times...
